articles.author: India Today Science Desk
articles.title: Twin blasts from Sun hit Earth, cause radio blackout over North America, Pacific Ocean - India Today
articles.description: The geomagnetic storm caused minor disturbances but the effect was felt at low altitudes as well.
articles.content: By India Today Science Desk: Hours after a geomagnetic storm slammed into Earth, Sun has exploded with twin flares, some of which are again directed towards the planet. A G1 class minor geomagnetic s… [+1981 chars]
